query:
SELECT 
  b.id, b.bookingNumber, b.customerId, b.siteId, b.status,
  u.id as userId, u.name as userName,
  cp.id as profileId, cp.companyName, cp.tradingName,
  s.id as siteId, s.centreId,
  sc.id as centreId, sc.name as centreName
FROM bookings b
INNER JOIN users u ON b.customerId = u.id
LEFT JOIN customer_profiles cp ON u.id = cp.userId
INNER JOIN sites s ON b.siteId = s.id
INNER JOIN shopping_centres sc ON s.centreId = sc.id
WHERE b.bookingNumber = 'CAMA-20260104-542';

  u.id as userId, u.name as userName,
  cp.id as profileId, cp.companyName, cp.tradingName,
  s.id as siteId, s.centreId,
  sc.id as centreId, sc.name as centreName
FROM bookings b
INNER JOIN users u ON b.customerId = u.id
LEFT JOIN customer_profiles cp ON u.id = cp.userId
INNER JOIN sites s ON b.siteId = s.id
INNER JOIN shopping_centres sc ON s.centreId = sc.id
WHERE b.bookingNumber = 'CAMA-20260104-542';
